video_caption: In the video, a man wearing a striped polo shirt stands in front of a whiteboard, explaining the products of electrolysis. The whiteboard displays the title "Products of electrolysis" and the subtitle "Electrolysis of aq. NaCl using Pt electrodes." The man writes chemical formulas and equations on the board, including Na+, Cl-, H3O+, and OH-. He also writes the equation for the reaction of H3O+ with electrons to produce H2 gas and water. The man gestures with his hands as he explains the concepts, pointing to the equations and formulas on the board. The background features a curtain with a pink and white pattern. The video includes text overlays in red, such as "Tendency to get discharged Ag+ > Cu2+ > H+ > ------" and "Lower is the discharge potential, greater is the tendency to get discharged," which provide additional information about the electrolysis process. The man appears to be teaching or presenting the material, using the whiteboard as a visual aid to support his explanation.

In the video, a man wearing a striped polo shirt is seen standing in front of a whiteboard, explaining the process of electrolysis of aqueous sodium chloride using platinum electrodes. He gestures towards the whiteboard, which contains chemical equations and diagrams illustrating the reactions at the cathode and anode. The man uses a marker to emphasize specific parts of the equations, pointing out the products of electrolysis. The background features a curtain with a pinkish hue, adding a touch of color to the educational setting. The man appears to be teaching or presenting the information, engaging with the audience through his gestures and explanations. The video captures the man's movements as he writes and points at the whiteboard, providing a clear and detailed explanation of the electrolysis process.

In the video, a man wearing a striped polo shirt is seen standing in front of a whiteboard, explaining the process of electrolysis. He is writing chemical equations and formulas on the board, which include the electrolysis of NaCl using Hg as cathode and the presence of water. The man is actively gesturing with his hands and pointing to the equations as he explains them. The background features a curtain with a pink and beige pattern, and the atmosphere appears to be educational and focused. The man's facial expressions and body language suggest that he is engaged in teaching and explaining the concepts clearly. The video captures the man's movements as he writes and explains the chemical reactions, providing a detailed and informative lesson on electrolysis.

In the video, a man wearing a striped polo shirt stands in front of a whiteboard, explaining the products of electrolysis, specifically focusing on the electrolysis of H2SO4. He begins by writing "Products of electrolysis" and "Electrolysis of H2SO4" on the board. The man then writes "I Low Current density" and proceeds to write chemical formulas such as "H+ + SO4^2-" and "H3O+ + OH-". He explains the reactions at the cathode, writing "H3O+ + e- -> 1/2 H2(g) + H2O(l)" and "4OH- -> 2H2O + O2(g) + 4e-". The man uses hand gestures to emphasize his points and points to the text on the board. The background features a pink curtain, and the atmosphere is educational. The video includes a text overlay at the bottom of the screen that reads "Tendency to get discharged I -> Br- > Cl- > RCOO- > OH- > -----" in red, providing additional information about the discharge tendencies of various ions.

In the video, a man wearing a striped polo shirt is seen standing in front of a whiteboard, explaining the products of electrolysis, specifically the electrolysis of H2SO4. He begins by writing the chemical equation for the electrolysis of H2SO4 at low current density, detailing the reactions at the cathode and anode. The man then proceeds to explain the high current density scenario, writing additional chemical equations and pointing to the board to emphasize key points. The background features a curtain with a pinkish hue, and the atmosphere appears to be that of an educational setting, possibly a classroom or a study room. The man's gestures and facial expressions suggest he is actively engaged in teaching, using the whiteboard as a visual aid to convey the information. The video captures the man's methodical approach to explaining the complex chemical processes involved in the electrolysis of sulfuric acid.

In the video, a man wearing a striped polo shirt stands in front of a whiteboard, explaining the products of electrolysis and the electrolysis of RCOONa using Pt electrodes. He gestures with his right hand, pointing at the text on the board, which is written in black marker. The background features a curtain with a pink and white pattern. The man appears to be engaged in a teaching or presentation setting, using hand movements to emphasize his points. The atmosphere is educational, with the focus on the content written on the whiteboard.

In the video, a man wearing a striped polo shirt is seen standing in front of a whiteboard, explaining the products of electrolysis. He writes on the board, starting with the title "Products of electrolysis" and "Electrolysis of RCOONa using Br electrodes." He then writes the chemical formulas "RCO2," "Na+," and "OH-," followed by the equation "H3O+ + e- -> 1/2 O2 + H2O" under the heading "At Cathode." The man continues to write on the board, explaining the reactions at the anode and cathode, and writes the equation "RCO2 -> RCO -> R+ + CO2" under the heading "At Anode." He also writes the equation "R+ + R -> R-R" and "R-R + 2O2 -> R-R + 2CO2." The man gestures towards the board, pointing to the equations and formulas, and appears to be explaining the concepts in detail. The background features a curtain with a pink and white pattern, and the atmosphere is educational and focused on the subject matter.
